oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-06-09 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from June 9, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Jim Reeves (host/performer), guest performers Flatt & Scruggs, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Red Hayes, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jim Reeves; Rod Brasfield; Flatt & Scruggs; Red Hayes; Del Wood
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Jim Reeves -- Yonder Comes A Sucker (Jim Reeves) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Jim Reeves) -- Jim Reeves introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Jim Reeves, Grant Turner) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Jim Reeves) -- Jim Reeves introduces Flatt & Scruggs -- Randy Lynn Rag (Flatt & Scruggs) -- Jim Reeves introduces Red Hayes -- Grey Eagle (Red Hayes fiddle) -- Jim Reeves talks -- It Is No Secret (Jim Reeves) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Jim Reeves) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Jim Reeves introduces Del Wood -- Smoky Mountain Polka (Del Wood) [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Wood, Del; Atkins, Chet; Flatt, Lester; Scruggs, Earl; Hayes, Red; Reeves, Jim
